mapper.select: INSERT INTO hf_payment_account ( com_account_id, com_account_class_id, hf_type, payment_month, payment_status ) SELECT ca.com_account_id, cac.com_account_class_id, cac.hf_type, cac.com_hf_month, IF (ca.payment_way = 1, 2, 1) FROM hf_com_account_class cac INNER JOIN hf_com_account ca ON ca.com_account_id = cac.com_account_id WHERE cac.is_active = 1 AND ca.is_active = 1 AND ca.state = 1 AND ca.hf_account_type!=4 AND ifnull(cac.end_type,'')='' AND ifnull(cac.com_hf_month,'')!='' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM hf_payment_account pa WHERE pa.com_account_class_id = cac.com_account_class_id AND pa.payment_month = cac.com_hf_month )

SELECT IF(ca.payment_way=3,'1','0') AS 'is_company_enjoy_advance' FROM hf_payment_account pa INNER JOIN hf_com_account ca ON ca.com_account_id=pa.com_account_id WHERE pa.is_active = 1 AND pa.payment_account_id=#{paymentAccountId} limit 1
